Parte 1:

EXEMPLO DO SLIDE:

0.5 2.5 2 4 3.5 6 5.5

ln(x)
1 4 6 5

Parte 2:

PROBLEMAS TESTE:

>>> 11.1
1/(((x)**(5))*(exp((1.432/2600)-1)))
1
2
5

>>> 11.6  
(2*pi*0.00000595481384)/((x)**(5)*(exp((0.00071939549/x)-1)))
0.00003933666
0.00005895923
1

(2*pi*0.00000595481384)/((x)**(5)*(e**(0.000239798497/x)-1))
0.00003933666
0.00005895923

>>> 11.11 
(1/(0.005*(2*pi)**(1/2)))*e**(-(1/2)*((x-4.991)/0.005)**(2))
4.991
5

EXEMPLO DO SLIDE:

0.2 + 25*x - 200*(x**2) + 675*(x**3) - 900*(x**4) + 400*(x**5)
0
0.8
3
